text: The line plots below show the heights of a random sample of 32 male professional basketball players and the heights of a random sample of 32 female professional basketball players. The mean and the mean absolute deviation (MAD) are given for each sample.

tiles.title: Heights of Female Professional Basketball Players
Heights of Male Professional Basketball Players

text: • Examine the distribution for each sample. What do you notice? What do you wonder?

There are 32 data observations (dots) on each line plot that represent professional players.

The mean for the male player heights is larger than the mean for the female player heights. The means differ by about 16 centimeters, which is a noticeable difference in height.

Note: This difference is unusual when comparing samples unless the samples are from different populations like they are here.

The MADs of the two distributions are similar. They are only about 2 units away from one another. So, the variabilities are similar in terms of MAD.

There is slightly more variability in the heights of the male professional players.

The MAD is larger â€“ approximately 8.8 vs 7.1.

The range is larger - approximately 49cm vs 30cm.

Female professional basketball player distribution: 93.75% (30 of the 32 data values) are within two MADs of the mean.

Male professional basketball player distribution: 90.625% (29 of the 32 data values) are within two MADs of the mean.

Note: The MAD tells us how far, on average (i.e., mean), all values are from the distribution mean. If the MAD is small, there is less variability in the data; if it is large, there is more variability in the data. When there is more variability, the mean may not be as good a descriptor of what is typical in the data set.

The line (dot) plots have slight variations in shape.

The heights of the Female Players clusters. Most data observations seem to cluster from 175cm to 185 cm with another cluster just shorter and taller than 195cm.

The heights of the Male Players has gaps with a cluster of data from just taller than 190 cm to just taller than 210.

The plots below show, for each distribution, the locations of three MADs less than the mean and three MADs greater than the mean

tiles.title: Heights of Female Professional Basketball Players
Heights of Male Professional Basketball Players
